greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Position of first occurrence of n in the continued fraction for the Euler-Mascheroni constant (gamma).
comment: This sequence is the same as A033149, but uses correct [a_0; a_1, a_2, ...] indexing of continued fraction terms.
The smallest numbers not occurring in the first 4,851,382,841 terms of the c.f. are 27943, 33436, 33978, 34017, ... - _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jul 22 2013
link: Eric W. Weisstein, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..27942
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Euler-Mascheroni Constant Continued Fraction
xref: Cf. A002852 (continued fraction for Euler-Mascheroni constant).
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jul 22 2013
